crossVertical.servicesUnified: Unified {orders} orders and {bookings} bookings for merchant {merchantId}.
crossVertical.servicesUnifiedDescription: Mtables and Munch services have been unified across branches.
crossVertical.pointsSyncedDescription: Loyalty points from Munch and Mtables have been synchronized.
crossVertical.uiEnsured: Ensured consistent UI with theme {theme} for merchant {merchantId}.
crossVertical.uiEnsuredDescription: UI settings have been applied across all branches.
crossVertical.pointsAwardedDescription: Points can be redeemed for rewards or cross-vertical activities.

errors.invalidMerchantId: The provided merchant ID is invalid.
errors.invalidMerchantIdDescription: Please provide a valid merchant ID.
errors.invalidMerchantDescription: The specified merchant does not exist.
errors.invalidCustomerId: The provided customer ID is invalid.
errors.invalidCustomerIdDescription: Please provide a valid customer ID.
errors.invalidCustomerDescription: The specified customer does not exist.
errors.noBranches: No branches found for the merchant.
errors.noBranchesDescription: The merchant has no registered branches.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.unauthorizedDescription: Only merchants or customers can access cross-vertical features.

gamification.welcome: Welcome to cross-vertical rewards! Earn points by unifying services, syncing loyalty points, and ensuring UI consistency.
gamification.progress: Great work! You've earned {points} so far.
gamification.progressDescription: Continue using cross-vertical features to earn more.
gamification.milestoneDescription: Check your dashboard for new rewards.
